**Example**

```esql
FROM books
| WHERE MATCH(author, "Faulkner")
| KEEP book_no, author
| SORT book_no
| LIMIT 5
```

| 2378 | [Carol Faulkner, Holly Byers Ochoa, Lucretia Mott] |
| 2713 | William Faulkner |
| 2847 | Colleen Faulkner |
| 2883 | William Faulkner |
| 3293 | Danny Faulkner |
